title: Starting Out in Lumbridge
goal: Prepare for Cook's Assistant and gather initial supplies.

steps.text: Talk to the Lumbridge Guide to get your initial tools.
Walk to the pond north of the castle and catch 5 Shrimp.
Walk west to the trees and chop 5 logs.
Light the logs and cook the shrimp on the fire.
Walk to the Lumbridge Castle kitchen to start Cook's Assistant.
